pages.text: Lightning is spawned during a thunderstorm with higher chances on a $(item)Lightning Rod$() or when a $(item)Trident$() enchanted with $(l:enchanting/enchantments#channeling)$(thing)Channeling$() is thrown. $(br2)$(n)Lightning bolts can have many different effects:$() $(li)Hurt entities and set them on fire$(br)$(li)Creates fires on impact $(br)$(li)Spawns with a 0.75-6.75% chance a $(thing)Skeleton Trap Horse$() which transforms into 4 $(thing)Skeletal Horsemen$() when triggered

$(n)A lightning strike affects certain mobs differently:$() $(br)$(li)A $(thing)$(l:creatures/animal-pig)Pig$() turns into a $(l:creatures/undead-zombified_piglin)$(thing)Zombified Piglin$() $(br)$(li)A $(l:creatures/monster-creeper)$(thing)Creeper$() becomes a $(l:creatures/monster-creeper)$(thing)Charged Creeper$() $(br)$(li)A $(l:creatures/human-villager)$(thing)Villager$() turns into a $(l:creatures/human-witch)$(thing)Witch$() $(br)$(li)A Red $(l:creatures/animal-mooshroom)$(thing)Mooshroom$() turns into a Brown $(l:creatures/animal-mooshroom)$(thing)Mooshroom$() $(br)$(li)A Brown $(l:creatures/animal-mooshroom)$(thing)Mooshroom$() turns into a Red $(l:creatures/animal-mooshroom)$(thing)Mooshroom$()
